# Dependencies

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

```

# Get data, join, and write to disk

```{r}

# processed data
data_participant_level <- read_rds("processed/3_data_participant_level.csv")

# hand scored data
data_hand_scored <- read_excel("processed/4_data_hand_scored.csv") 

# deepfake_concept_check
# deepfake_check
# recognised_manipulation

# join
data_participant_level_with_hand_scorings <- data_participant_level %>%
  left_join(data_hand_scored, by = "subject")

# write to disk
write_csv(data_participant_level_with_hand_scorings, "processed/5_data_participant_level_with_hand_scorings.csv")
  
```
